Function reference

All functions

check_adjacent()
Return neighbouring points that have a height less than 9
check_height()
Check height is less than 9
compare_heights()
Find `height` of adjacent points and if it's lower than all `adjacent_points`, return risk level

decode()
Decode each string (digit) in `unknown_vector`
deconstruct()
Split string into vector of letters
find_digit()
Find string in `string_vector` of length `num_characters`
subset_of()
Find the string in `unknown_vector` whose segments (characters) are a subset of `known_string`
survey()
For a particular `lowest_point`, survey the basin and return it's size
